name.description: name of protein from RefSeq database

summary.description: protein function summary from RefSeq database

url.description: url for protein entry in RefSeq database
url for the gene name in UniProtKB/RefSeq database

id.description: protein identifier for the gene in UniProtK and RefSeq

url.description: url for the name from the protein resource

protein_names.description: list of protein names from UniProtKB and RefSeq

annotation.description: protein function annotation description from UniProtKB and/or RefSeq

function.description: list of protein function from UniProtKB and/or RefSeq

disease_id.description: identifier for disease from disease specific database

resource.description: resource for the recommended disease name

url.description: url for the disease identifier in the disease database

description.description: definition or description of the disease

resource.description: resource for the synonym disease name

url.description: url for the disease identifier in the disease database

description.description: definition or description of the disease

evidence.description: evidence from a disease database for association between disease and protein

disease.description: list of diseases associated with proteins

glycoeffect.description: glycoeffect due to mutation that could be either loss of glycosylation site or gain of glycosylation site

comment.description: comment containing additional information about snv entry

subjects_tested.description: number of patients tested for the given mutation for the given cancer type

subjects_positive.description: number of patients positive for the given mutation for the given cancer type

frequency.description: percent ratio of patients positive and patient tested

resource.description: resource for the recommended disease name

url.description: url for the disease identifier in the disease database

description.description: definition or description of the disease

resource.description: resource for the synonym disease name

url.description: url for the disease identifier in the disease database

description.description: definition or description of the disease

disease.description: list os snv entries associated with disease

comment.description: comment containing additional information about the mutatgenesis entry

url.description: url for the tissue identifier in the uberon database

score.description: the gene expression score based on the combined expression and tissue specificity

present.description: presence or absence of gene expression

evidence.description: list of tissue gene expression entries

expression_tissue.description: list of gene expression entries associated with tissues

significant.description: significant differential expression of the gene that can be either `Yes` or `No`

trend.description: expression trend of the gene that can be either `Up` or `Down`

url.description: url for the disease identifier in the disease database

resource.description: resource for the recommended disease name

url.description: url for the disease identifier in the disease database

description.description: definition or description of the disease

resource.description: resource for the synonym disease name

url.description: url for the disease identifier in the disease database

description.description: definition or description of the disease

disease.description: disease information for the gene expression entry

expression_disease.description: list of gene expression entries associated with diseases

species.description: species/organism to which the protein belongs

name.description: list of gene name of the protein

id.description: Ensembl gene identifier for the gene

url.description: url for the gene chromosome from the Ensembl database

crossref.description: list of entries and links to other databases

url.description: url for the isoform from the UniProtKB database

chromosome.description: chromosome number for the gene of the protein isoform

id.description: Ensembl gene identifier for the isoform

url.description: url for the isoform chromosome location in Ensembl

locus.description: chromosome information for the gene of protein isoform

glytoucan_ac.description: GlyTouCan accession for the glycosylated entry

site_category.description: type of glycosylation entry- with or without glycan

comment.description: comment containing additional information about the glycosylation entry
comment containing additional information about phosphorylation entry

kinase_uniprot_canonical_ac.description: UniProtKB canonical accession for the kinase enzyme phosphorylating protein

kinase_gene_name.description: gene name for the kinase enzyme phosphorylating protein

relation.description: glycated monosaccharide relation to the protein

ptm_annotation.description: list of post translational modification annotations for the UniProtKB canonical accession protein

publication.description: list of publications where the protein was mentioned

url.description: url for the entry from the pathway resource

pathway.description: list of pathways from Reactome and KEGG databases

uniprot_canonical_ac.description: UniProtKB canonical accession for the orthologous protein

protein_name.description: UniProtKB protein name for the orthalogous protein

gene_name.description: gene name of the ortholog protein

tax_id.description: taxonomy identifierentifier for the orthologous species/organism

organism.description: scientific name for the orthalogous organism

sequence.description: FASTA sequence for the orthalogous protein

length.description: length of the protein sequence of the orthalogous protein

sequence.description: sequence information for the orthalogous protein

common_name.description: common name for the orthologous organism

orthologs.description: list of orthologs to the given protein

url.description: url for the gene ontology term from the gene ontology resource

pro_annotation.description: list of protein ontology annotation (currently for glycoproteins)

site_annotation.description: list of site annotations for the UniProtKB canonical protein accession

best_biomarker_type.description: biomarker category according to fda best glossary

status.description: describes the change in the biomarker entity

resource.description: resource for the recommended disease name

url.description: url for the disease identifier in the disease database

description.description: definition or description of the disease

resource.description: resource for the synonym disease name

description.description: definition or description of the disease

disease.description: list of diseases associated with the biomarker

tissue.description: tissue where the biomarker entity is measured

sort_fields.description: field order for front end display

name.description: name for isoforms or homologs sequence alignement clusters

label.description: label for isoforms or homologs sequence alignement clusters

cluster_types.description: types of isoforms or homologs in sequence alignment set clusters
